---
category: news
title: "Faster drug discovery through machine learning"
excerpt: "Drugs can only work if they stick to their target proteins in the body. Assessing that stickiness is a key hurdle in the drug discovery and screening process. New research combining chemistry and machine learning could lower that hurdle."
